thread.section_title: Elara Online Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elara Online | www.elara.ie
thread.title: Jozsef Kukola
thread.title_full: Elara Online reviewed by Jozsef Kukola

author: Jozsef Kukola
title: Jozsef Kukola
text: I can really recommend Elara.ie. I have been using their service a couple of times in the past and they have always been excellent. Website is not the latest design, but it's mostly straightforward, the availability of each item is clearly visible. Prices are comparable or slightly better of those available in Ireland, even if shipping costs would add a little to the final price. unfortunately there is no next day delivery on offer, but most of the times it can be lived with. An overall reliable, great experience.
